subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury could be compared to his $15 sneakers these last four months: accessible, conscientious and humble. But the old Marbury showed up during the Knicks' loss on Saturday night.
snippet: Stephon Marbury could be compared to his $15 sneakers these last four months: accessible, conscientious and humble. But the old Marbury showed up during the Knicks' loss on Saturday night.
